metadata.title: CVE-2019-11700 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A hyperlink using the res: protocol can be used to open local files at aknown location in Internet Explorer if a user approves execution whenprompted. *Note: this issue only occurs on Windows. Other operating systemsare unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 67.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
